summary: A comic western about a cowboy who seeks a wanted and evil man who caused for the death of his beloved horse Easy.
cast: Graham Low|Martin Curtis|Oli van der Vijver|Quentin Green|William Cornes|Edward Scotland|Richard Green|Amy Bowles|Stuart Low|Nicola Stapleton|James Bailey|Ian Crick|Tim Wyatt|Rich Adams|Nick Netsall|Sarah Newton|Daniel Brostrom|John Jordan|Edgar Wright|Neil Mullarkey|Antony Wilson|Jason Rimmell|Stuart Ferris Brown|Tilly Langdon|Luciano Raso|Silvio Raso|Nick Clark|Dan Palmer|Phil Renn|Samantha Espensen|Jeremy Beadle|James Lance|Mark Sheffield|Robert Yarde|Philip Bouchard|Steve Jones|Sebastian Smith|Gavin Elwood|Jon Knowles|Conrad Comer|Grant Restorick|David Smith|Chris Bayliss|Andrew Bedford|Christian Ardron|Nicola McKinley|Rachel McKinley|Tamara Urwin|Henry Scotland
title: A Fistful of Fingers
